name: Adana Kebab
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
method: 1. In a large bowl, mix together the lamb mince, onion, cumin, sumac, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper.2. Divide the mixture into 8 portions and shape each into a long sausage shape around a skewer.3. Grill the kebabs over medium-high heat for 5-6 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.

name: Mercimek Köftesi
method: 1. Rinse the lentils and place them in a pot with the water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the lentils are soft and the water is absorbed.2. Mix together the cooked lentils, bulgur, onion, olive oil, lemon juice, tomato paste, salt, cumin, black pepper.

name: Baklava
method: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).2. Mix together the walnuts and sugar in a bowl.3. Grease a baking dish with some of the melted butter.4. Lay a sheet of phyllo dough in the bottom of the baking dish, then brush with melted butter. Repeat with 5 more sheets of phyllo dough, brushing each with butter.
